alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 12:46AM CDT until June 24 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR EASTERN CHERRY...NORTHWESTERN ROCK...BROWN...NORTHWESTERN BLAINE...NORTHEASTERN THOMAS AND KEYA PAHA COUNTIES... At 1245 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Norden to 6 miles southwest of Johnstown to 10 miles northwest of Purdum, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Springview, Long Pine, Johnstown, Purdum, Norden, Elsmere, Wood Lake, Burton, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Smith Falls State Park, Koshopah, Antelope Peak, Nets Peak and Moon Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 194 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 208 and 252. Highway 83 between mile markers 155 and 181. Highway 12 between mile markers 10 and 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas
